tied for favorite game of 2024 with elden ring for me good satisfying movement mechanics with well designed maps to match fair dodgingkiting mechanics fun power fantasy while at the same time not being a boring invincible slog at higher levels  i do wish the nonrundefiningfiller perk choices could be a bit more interesting some of the guns i never use

absolute banger of a game if you need the scratch that itch of playing something like borderlands with risk of rain then this is going to be right up your alley solid gunplay mixed with enemy variety the right blend of procedural weapons and items  class and skill mix and a banging sound track got hooked in just the first 30 minutes of gameplay alone 5 hours in it felt like i had been playing for days
